InstructionData.Title: Value to Hash
InstructionData.Author: Orpheus2468
InstructionData.Instructions:
define LED 1944485013 alias SelectReceip d0 alias Start d1 alias ControlIC d3 alias RecipeIC d4 alias Hash db alias SelectValue r0 alias RecipeHash0 r1 alias RecipeAmount0 r2 alias RecipeHash1 r3 alias RecipeAmount1 r4 alias RecipeHash2 r5 alias RecipeAmount2 r6 alias StartCMD r7 alias VKE r8 alias HashValue r15 move HashValue 0 move SelectValue 0 s SelectReceip Mode 17 Main:
s Hash Setting HashValue #stores Target Hash l StartCMD Start Setting bdns RecipeIC NoRecipe l VKE RecipeIC Setting sne VKE 0 VKE mul VKE VKE 1 add VKE VKE 2 sb LED Color VKE beq VKE 4 NoRecipe beq StartCMD 0 NoRecipe s RecipeIC Setting 1 NoRecipe: bdns ControlIC NoFurnace s ControlIC Setting StartCMD NoFurnace: #Convert value to Hash l SelectValue SelectReceip Setting mul SelectValue SelectValue 2 #two lines per hash add SelectValue SelectValue 1 #start current line +1 jr SelectValue move HashValue 0 j Main move HashValue -404336834 #Copper 1 j Main move HashValue 226410516 #Gold 2 j Main move HashValue -1301215609 #Iron 3 j Main move HashValue 2134647745 #Lead 4 j Main move HashValue -1406385572 #Nickel 5 j Main move HashValue -290196476 #Silicon 6 j Main move HashValue -929742000 #Silver 7 j Main move HashValue 1058547521 #Constantan 8 j Main move HashValue 502280180 #Electrum 9 j Main move HashValue -297990285 #Invar 10 j Main move HashValue -82508479 #Solder 11 j Main move HashValue -654790771 #Steel 12 j Main move HashValue 412924554 #Astroloy 13 j Main move HashValue 1579842814 #Hastelloy 14 j Main move HashValue -787796599 #Inconel 15 j Main move HashValue -1897868623 #Stellite 16 j Main move HashValue 156348098 #Waspaloy 17 j Main
j Main #Recipe SendHash: #sb -815193061 Setting 1 l VKE RecipeIC Setting brne VKE 0 -1 #wait until IC is Ready to recive s RecipeIC Setting HashValue yield l VKE RecipeIC Setting brne VKE 0 -1 move RecipeAmount0 3 s RecipeIC Setting RecipeAmount0 #sb -815193061 Setting VKE yield j ra
j Main #backup :-)
